column1: Hamfast lived in [[Gamwich]]. He was the father of [[Wiseman Gamwich
column2: Wiseman]], who moved to [[Tighfield]], and as such, he was the progenitor of the [[Gamwich Family

column1: The name ''Hamfast'' comes from [[Old English]] ''hámfæst'', meaning "stay-at-home". It was a translation of Westron ''Ranugad''.<ref>{{App
